Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperGeodes_Text: I require a selection of geodes for a geology lesson, and would deeply appreciate the delivery of 20 geodes to the Archaeology House.  Many thanks, M. Jasper (Prof).
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperGeodes_Obje: Deposit 20 Geodes in the drop box at the museum counter.
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperScrolls_Tex: I current seek the mysteries of the dwarves and have heard that certain scrolls can be located deep in the mines. Please, if you have found any, I would deeply appreciate them for my research. - M. Jasper (Prof).
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperScrolls_Obj: Deliver a dwarf scroll with a red bow to Jasper
Deliver a dwarf scroll with a green ribbon to Jasper
Deliver a dwarf scroll with a blue rope to Jasper
Deliver a dwarf scroll with a gold chain to Jasper
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperDevices_Tex: My research on the Smoluanu requires a selection of mysterious objects, found in the mines and the volcano. Is anyone please available to deliver them to the Archaeology House. Many Thanks     - M. Jasper (Prof).
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperDevices_Obj: Deliver 1 Dwarven Gadget to the museum counter.
Deliver 1 Rare Disc to the museum counter.
Deliver 20 Cinder Shards to the museum counter.

Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperGeodesMail: Dear @,^I am most grateful for your contribution. I hope the children will be delighted to discover the wonders that are hidden within the rock. Please feel free to drop by the Blacksmith during our Wednesday lesson.^Please find included a token of appreciation.^^   - M. Jasper (Prof).%item bigobject 21 %%[#]Geode Order Thank You
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperScrollsMail: Dear @,^Thank you so much for those scrolls. I am confident that they shall yield many revelations. Please accept these small gifts as a token of gratitude; they are rumored to be a Dwarven delicacy.^^  - M. Jasper (Prof.)%item object 554 5 %%[#]Scrolls Order Thank You
Entries.Lemurkat.SpecialOrders.JasperDeviceMail: Dear @,^Your delivery has been gratefully received. I shall keep you updated on my studies as they proceed, but for the moment, please enjoy the enclosed. I hope you will find them useful.^^   - M. Jasper (Prof).%item object 852 5 %%[#]Dwarvish Devices Thank You
